About Me

Hi, I’m Dario and I’m a backend developer and system administrator. I also do frontend (somewhat reluctantly 😜).

I’m currently working at/for rechnerherz and MediPrime.

I enjoy working with Java/Kotlin (preferably Kotlin), JavaScript/TypeScript (preferably TypeScript), and Spring.
